subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The game-tying grand slam from David Ortiz and a single from Jarrod Saltalamacchia sealed the dramatic late-game comeback for the Red Sox to even the series at a game apiece.
snippet: The game-tying grand slam from David Ortiz and a single from Jarrod Saltalamacchia sealed the dramatic late-game comeback for the Red Sox to even the series at a game apiece.
